item.description:
Since many of us will be at the museum for the Decision Factor lecture why don't we have some fun after.


Dante's Lounge is equipped with a fully stocked bar and menu and staffed by knowledgeable bartenders and waitstaff employees, this is the perfect place to end a Friday evening at the Museum. This is inside the Sonesta and will not be affected by weather. The lounge is open every Friday 8:30 - 12:00 p.m.


We went as a group last week and had a blast.  This event will not be weather permitting so we will enjoy regardless of if it's too cold, or cloudy.  So it will be a nice "November" night.

 

Also, the lecture is posted as a separate event and it should be cool so check that out and sign up for it.

 

If you find this first, you can register at this link: http://decisionfactor.eventbrite.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Around the corner from the museum in the Sonesta Hotel in the Lounge area
item.name: Drinks at Dante (in the Sonesta) following the MOS Lecture
